question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to fly forward over the road, then turn right to follow the road. Find the seven-story red brick building on the left side of the road and stop on its roof. What is the direction to your destination when you reach your current location?  
choose:  
A. I am currently locating above the road and slightly to the right of the seven-story red brick building.  
B. I am currently locating directly above the seven-story red brick building at a similar height.  
C. I am currently locating behind a seven-story red brick building on the other side of the road.  
D. I am currently locating on the left side of the seven-story red brick building, still above the road.  
E. I am currently locating directly above the parking lot in front of the seven-story red brick building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is directly above the seven-story red brick building at a similar height, as indicated by the aerial view showing the roof of the building directly below.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(2:20, 2:21)]
Option: B
Reason: At 2:20-2:21, the video shows a red brick building. The camera is directly above the building, and the height is similar to the building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is directly above the seven-story red brick building at a similar height, as indicated by the aerial view showing the roof of the building directly below.
